text: I like to embrace natural beauty. I try to get at least 8 hours of sleep, drinking a lot of water and exercising.
author: Tia Mowry

text: I find beauty in the grotesque, like most artists.
author: Alexander McQueen

text: The past itself, as historical change continues to accelerate, has become the most surreal of subjects - making it possible... to see a new beauty in what is vanishing.
author: Susan Sontag

text: It is shallow people who think beauty is frivolous or excessive. If you are bringing beauty and god, you are enriching the country. Rice feeds the body, books feed the mind, beauty feeds the soul. It is one thing I can really be proud of and stand tall in the world.
author: Imelda Marcos

text: The only rich person is a person who is rich in spirit. I have no money deposit. I have only beauty deposit.
author: Imelda Marcos
